name: Perfect Drops
description: Makes all items drop with perfect rolls.
author: olegbl

config.name: Item Types
config.description: Select which item types to apply perfect rolls to.

children.name: Unique
children.description: Enable to force unique items to have perfect rolls.

children.name: Set
children.description: Enable to force set items to have perfect rolls.

children.name: Magic / Rare
children.description: Enable to force magic and rare items to have perfect rolls.

children.name: High Quality
children.description: Enable to force high quality items to have perfect rolls.

children.name: Runeword
children.description: Enable to force runeword items to have perfect rolls.

children.name: Crafted
children.description: Enable to force items generated by Horadric Cube recipes to have perfect rolls.

config.name: Other Settings
config.description: Additional configuration options for which affixes, properties, etc... should be rolled perfectly.

children.name: Auto Affixes
children.description: Enable to force auto affixes (affixes that do not modify an item's rarity) to have perfect rolls.

children.name: Always +3 to Skill Trees
children.description: Enable to force affixes that give a bonus to a specific skill tree to always give a bonus of 3 levels, even if their max value is normally smaller.

children.name: Maximum Defense
children.description: Enable to force armor items to spawn with the possible defense.

children.name: Affix Tiers
children.description: Even if each affix's value is perfect, you can still have a low tier affix spawn on a high level item. This setting controls this behavior.

options.label: Equalize
options.description: Higher tier affixes spawn as frequently as lower tier affixes.

options.label: Perfect
options.description: Affixes always spawn at their highest possible tier.
